response.original_title: 魔進戦隊キラメイジャーキラメキムービーvol.2
response.overview: This is a special movie that shows the secrets about Kira Major, such as the organization "CARAT" to which the 5 people of Kirameijer belong, their partner Kiramei Mashin, robots and weapons.  In addition, it is a video of super luxurious members with Mabushina and Hakata Minami Murin also appearing!!!  There are also other powerful robot merging scenes and Kirameijer's action scenes, so please check it out!  Kiramei GO!!
response.title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager: Kirameki Movie Vol. 2
